intro desc: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will
default story countries: By default, you can only see stories from your country, to change it to All countries, 5000 points will be removed from your balance
default chat countries: By default, you can only see people from your country, to change it to All countries, 5000 points will be removed from your balance
default posts countries: By default, only people from your country can see your posts, to change it to All countries, 5000 points will be removed from your balance
product all countries: By choosing All countries, 1000 points will be removed from your balance
more than 3 shipping countries: To choose more than 3 shipping countries, 1000 points will be removed from your balance

signup desc: But I must explain to you how all
sign in to continue: Sign in or Register to continue
can not request bill now: You can request your bill after 10 days from sell date, to ensure product delivery
sign in to subscribe: Sign in to subscribe to a package
story is not available for guests: You have to sign in or register to see stories
story is not available for companies: Story is not available for companies
chat is not available for guests: You have to sign in or register to use chat
chat is not available for companies: Chat is not available for companies
countries which your posts will appear o: Countries which your posts will appear on
you should agree on terms and conditions: You should agree on terms and conditions
any active packages: In case you have any active packages, you will lose the remaining balance
